name: My Caterpiller Story!!
description:
Made for Mini Jam 123: Web

My story is about a caterpiller who's ground was taken away by bad stinky aliens and is looking for revenge!!!!

This game's only level is exactly 1 minute long. Remember to look out for bullets.

Made with:

  • Code: p5.js
  • Graphics: Krita
  • Sound Effects: sox

All the files used in the making of the game are provided in the downloads. The code is under GPLv2. The assets and asset source files are under CC BY-SA 4.0
